Speaker: SPEAKER_03
Text: Hey, there's nothing more important than what we talk about. It's your money. It's your life.

Speaker: SPEAKER_03
Text: Let's go to Orlando, Florida. W.D.O. Desmond, welcome to the show.

Speaker: SPEAKER_01
Text: I'm phoning you tonight regarding what I feel is the sure...

Speaker: SPEAKER_01
Text: The sure fire investment idea for 95.

Speaker: SPEAKER_02
Text: A surefire? No, wait a minute, surefire?

Speaker: SPEAKER_01
Text: And is this something that's going to...

Speaker: SPEAKER_01
Text: to incite the proverbial riot in the streets? I don't think so. Is it something that's going to make a whole lot of money? Yes, it is. It involves the sale of mangoes. Now, I'm at the Caribbean Islands to be fired with you.

Speaker: SPEAKER_03
Text: You know, he has one of those, one of those spy phones, one of those gadget phones. And Desmond did the crackpot with a cool little knobby on his phone.
